title: Kuntillat 'Ajrud
description: A late ninth to early eighth century BC site located in the northeastern part of the Sinai peninsula, the fortress-like Kuntillat â€˜Ajrud may have been a sanctuary. Hebrew and Phoenician inscriptions have been identified at the site.
